page.title: 04EDUCATION 3 to 18 years
page.content: {PRE SCHOOL.}The Wiltshire County Council provide no nursery education but playgroups and Mother and Toddler groups exist in Lacock and Derry Hill. {INFANT & JUNIOR.}Sate education for those in the SW of the area is provided in Lacock Village and for those in the NW at Derry Hill.Both are former C of E schools. The Roman Catholic children attend schools in neighbouring Chippenham and Corsham. {SECONDARY}This is provided by the state by two comprehensive schools in Chippenham.The loacal authority run buses to enable the children to attend.Catholic children will either use schools at Bath or Trowbridge. {PRIVATE}Families in the area also seek private education which is available loccally in Corsham and Bath.
